ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Charm and damage/hate lists
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Heh.  :)  You just have to know how to get away if you re forced to zone.  I either Chain (if fighting a single mob), invis, and head for the zone.  Or I
ygData.messageBody:
On Wed, 15 Mar 2000, Jeff Illian wrote:
>
> Dude, you've got major balls... Either that or you are just plain nuts.

Heh. :) You just have to know how to get away if you're
forced to zone. I either Chain (if fighting a single mob),
invis, and head for the zone. Or I fear (if fighting multiple
mobs or casters), invis, and head for the zone. Come to think
of it, aside from one really nasty incident involving the king
with a mithril 2h sword (killed me in about 12 seconds), I
haven't died in Lower Guk in months. And I've been spending a
lot of time soloing in there ever since I hit 48.

Has anyone else noticed a bug where 2h swords often will not
show up in a mob's hand, their attack messages say hit
(instead of slash), but the damage is for a 2h sword and they
have it when you loot them?

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
